name: PolcalNet Global Poverty (2017)
title: PolcalNet Global Poverty (2017)
description: Countries for which both consumption and income expenditure data was available, we present mean and median per capita consumption expenditure only.

fields.name: Mean monthly per capita expenditure in 2011 int-$ (PovcalNet 2017)
fields.description: The average monthly per capita income/consumption expenditure (from household surveys) in 2011 PPP international dollars.
